    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Race &amp; Ethnicity in Latin America &amp; the Caribbean &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17030185">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17030185">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17030185">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17030185">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17030185" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17030186">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17030186">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17030186">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17030186">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17030186" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17030187">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17030187">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17030187">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works (good for generating topics and recommending sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17030187">
          <div id="boxatt17030187" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20077376">
              <a id="link_20077376" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search~S0?/tencyclopedia+of+mexico/tencyclopedia+of+mexico/1,1,2,B/frameset&amp;FF=tencyclopedia+of+mexico+history+society+and+culture&amp;2,,2" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077376,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Race &amp; Ethnicity in Latin America &amp; the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20077376}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Mexico
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Signed articles written by leading scholars in the field. Great for topic narrowing and for identifying the most important articles and books on a subject.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20077385">
              <a id="link_20077385" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077385,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Race &amp; Ethnicity in Latin America &amp; the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344702}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Signed articles written by leading scholars in the field. Great for topic narrowing and for identifying the most important articles and books on a subject.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17030221">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17030221">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17030221">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding primary documents
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17030221">
          <p>
           Primary documents (painting, photographs, letters and diaries, fan sites, blogs, youtube video, and sound recordings) can be found abundantly by using any standard web search engine like Google. However, the library catalog and WorldCat (see below) can be good sources primary documents published in book form.
          </p>
          <p>
           See also the footnotes of secondary sources, which often will point to primary documentation.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           One excellent website offering access to primary documentation is
           <a href="http://slavevoyages.org/tast/index.faces">
            <em>
             Trans-Atlantic Slave Trade Database
            </em>
           </a>
           , sponsored by Emory University and others.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17030221" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17030188">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17030188">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17030188">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17030188">
          <div id="boxatt17030188" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20077402">
              <a id="link_20077402" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077402,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Race &amp; Ethnicity in Latin America &amp; the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of books and documents here and in libraries throughout the world. Use with interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17030189">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17030189">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17030189">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17030189">
          <div id="boxatt17030189" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20077352">
              <a id="link_20077352" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077352,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Race &amp; Ethnicity in Latin America &amp; the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286581}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription database. Standard index for peer-reviewed articles across the disciplines. Includes many full-text articles.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20077355">
              <a id="link_20077355" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077355,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Race &amp; Ethnicity in Latin America &amp; the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription database. Standard index for peer-reviewed articles and scholarly books on Latin American history.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17030190">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17030190">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17030190">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Websites more likely to be scholarly
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17030190">
          <div id="boxatt17030190" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20077448">
              <a id="link_20077448" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20077448,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Race &amp; Ethnicity in Latin America &amp; the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4630524" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17030973">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17030973">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17030973">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17030924">
          <p>
           Chicago style (foot/endnotes and bibliography format) For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           Or visit the
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           at Purdue.
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
           Annotated bibliographies:
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            Visit the University of Central Florida's
            <a href="http://library.ucf.edu/Rosen/guide_annotated.php">
             <em>
              Annotated Bibliographies
             </em>
            </a>
            guide.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17030924" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17030192">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17030192">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17030192">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17030192">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17030192" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
